metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1829-1 -- Recommended update for nfs-client
metadata.description:
This update for nfs-utils provides the following fixes:
* Fix decoding of octal encoded fields in idmapd. (bnc#802823) * Improve support for GSS security negotiation with old servers. (bnc#844015) * Correctly handle sub-directory exports from file systems with 64-bit inode numbers. (bnc#841971) * Ensure ldconfig cache is updated when libraries exist on NFS mounted file system. (bnc#834164) * Make it easy to enable NFSv4.1 support on server. (bnc#832264)
